price: 60. Kan toobad keena, oo rumeeya (Xaqa), oo sama fala mooyee. Kuwaasu waxay geli Jannada, iyagoon waxba laga dulmineyn.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā man tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-ulāika yadkhulūna al-janata walā yuẓ'lamūna shayan
